Verilog 8-bit CPU

Caltech10 CPU
December 2023
Verilog, Digital Design

The Caltech10 CPU is an 8-bit Harvard-architecture, accumulator-based CPU. The CPU has an 8-bit accumulator, two 8-bit data addressing registers (X and S) and a 13-bit program counter. All instructions are a single 16-bit word and almost all instructions execute in a single clock cycle.
